text:
Hello,
i have problem with my apache server. I compile and install sucessful apache 
1.3.24 under i386 OpenBSD 3.1 latest stable. I configure and run apache and 
apache work fine for 3-4 min. After this time apache stop response and need to 
restart from console "apachectl restart"
If i not restart apache, apache is loaded in memory but not response to users.
I looking in logs file, but logs nothing happened (no anything error messages).
Any ideas what is the problem and how to fix this problem? 

Regards,
Condor
creator: infoza@vcable.net
